comments.body: Probably the `--extension-dir` still has to be adjusted to `$PREFIX/share/code-server/extensions`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +18,22 @@find . -name zeromq.node
npm run package
code-server --install-extension ms-toolsai-jupyter-insiders.vsix
find ${PREFIX}/share/code-server/extensions/ms-toolsai.jupyter-*/out -name '*.js.map' -delete
